import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useCookies } from "react-cookie"; import { Redirect, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { IonItem, IonLabel, IonInput, IonButton, IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonGrid, IonCol, IonRow, } from "@ionic/react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./Login.css"; const Login: React.FC = () => { const [email, setEmail] = React.useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = React.useState(""); const [cookies, setCookie] = useCookies(["jwt"]); const handleClick = () => { const logProfile = { Email: email, Password: password, }; axios .post("http://localhost:3000/users/tab10", { logProfile, withCredentials: true, }) .then((response) => { setCookie("jwt", response.data, {path: "/"}); console.log(response); }); }; return ( Login Login



Email:

 setEmail(e.target.value)} clearInput >

 setPassword(e.target.value)} clearInput >

); }; export default Login;
